articles.title: Assassin’s Creed tabletop RPG focuses on its science fiction elements
articles.description: Assassin’s Creed is being turned into a D&D-like tabletop RPG. By focusing on the Animus technology, developer CMON says players will be set loose across time.

articles.title: As U.S. warns North Korea against giving Russia weapons for Ukraine, what could Kim Jong Un get in return?
articles.description: A senior South Korean official tells CBS News there's concern the isolated Kim regime could get nuclear submarine or satellite technology for helping Putin.

articles.title: Lockheed Martin trims F-35 jet delivery outlook
articles.description: U.S. weapons maker Lockheed Martin (LMT.N) on Wednesday cut its delivery outlook for its F-35 jets, and delayed deliveries of its updated Technology Refresh 3 (TR-3) jets.
articles.content:
Sept 6 (Reuters) - U.S. weapons maker Lockheed Martin (LMT.N) on Wednesday cut its delivery outlook for its F-35 jets, and delayed deliveries of its updated Technology Refresh 3 (TR-3) jets.

articles.title: China Bans iPhone Use for Government Officials at Work
articles.description: Restrictions on foreign devices are the latest step in Beijing’s campaign to reduce reliance on overseas technology and could hurt Apple’s success in the country
